abstract: The world is in chaos, and unfortunately, this most likely will continue. Recent news reports are replete with stories of crises. These events demonstrate the implicit and explicit need for leadership. We believe these crises and their accompanying uncertainty are the reasons people have sought strong leaders  to bring order and sanity to an otherwise uncontrollable world. This is particularly true in homeland security and the emergency services.
title: The Leadership LEAP: A New Approach for Homeland Security
subject: law
